questions.paragraph: It is always recommended to wear a seatbelt. Mention the reason
popup: Because it protects the body from being propelled forward during a collision.

questions.paragraph: What are the factors that determine the speed of a moving object?
How to calculate the speed of a moving object?
State an example of safety equipment in cars that protects us during collisions .
What happens when the mass of the car that collides with a wall increases?
popup: The greater the mass of the car, the more damage resulting from the collision.
